::Hot Rod::

He went into his room, in the CF, and found things nocked over from the
battle. He tidyed up, and went to the CR's to repair. As he was being
repaired he dreamed. Images from his Autobot days, of Optimus and the
others. He also saw Feline. This reminded him of his personal mission.
Win her back...

::DrillBit::

He quickly transformes to beetle mode, and drills under the ground as
the terror force hits. After it is clear he comes up, and changes to bot
mode. He then fires optic lasers at Angel Prime.

::Epyon::

"Ok, Starice. I'll see you later."
He makes his way to the bridge of the StarJumper, and sits in his
command chair. He then opens a comm.
"Wizard, I need to speak with you on the bridge, at your convieniance."

::Demolition::

He flew towards the Destron base.
"So Havoc, how bad is it supposed to be there?"

::Dollen::

He still waited outside the energy field, with no response.
What had happaned to the traders?
